title: Specialized accounting and management services
subtitle: A complete structure to reduce taxes, organize finances, and ensure fiscal security for your company.

items.title: Company Formation and Restructuring
items.shortDescription: Business model analysis, tax regime selection, articles of incorporation drafting, and complete company regularization.
description: One of the biggest challenges for Brazilian companies is bureaucracy, particularly regarding formation, legalization, permits, and document updates, which if not done correctly can lead to fines and even shutdowns.
Our team will actively monitor the entire documentation process from start to finish, ensuring that your company operates legally, completely, and with integrity.
checklist: Regularization of fiscal and tax status with control agencies
Study and preparation of documents for spin-offs, mergers, incorporations, and acquisitions
Formation of Asset Holding Companies, Control, Family, Pure, Mixed, and Administrative structures
Obtaining Permits and Licenses from City Hall, Fire Department Clearance, Health Surveillance, and Environmental Clearance
Obtaining Negative Certificates from municipal, state, and federal tax authorities

items.title: Financial Management Consulting
items.shortDescription: Strategic support in cash flow organization, pricing, results analysis, and building financial indicators.
description: Efficient financial management is the foundation of any successful company. Many entrepreneurs struggle to organize their finances, understand their real costs, and make decisions based on concrete data.
Our consulting offers complete support to structure your cash flow, set prices strategically, and build indicators that truly matter for your business growth.
checklist: Strategic pricing of products and services

items.title: Audit, Tax Review, and Tax Recovery
items.shortDescription: Detailed review of calculations and obligations to identify credits and opportunities for recovering overpaid taxes.
items.heroTitle: Audit, Tax Review, and Tax Recovery
description: Many companies pay more taxes than they should due to lack of specialized monitoring. Tax review allows identifying unused credits and improperly paid taxes that can be recovered.
Our team conducts a thorough analysis of your tax calculations, identifying savings and recovery opportunities with complete legal security.
checklist: Review of PIS, COFINS, ICMS, and ISS calculations

items.title: Accounting and Tax Bookkeeping
items.shortDescription: Complete accounting and tax bookkeeping, financial statement issuance, and compliance with ancillary obligations.
description: Accounting and tax bookkeeping is mandatory for all companies and must be done accurately to avoid problems with tax authorities. Errors in this area can result in heavy fines and even penalties.
We offer complete bookkeeping service, ensuring that all your obligations are met within deadlines and in full legal compliance.
checklist: Tax bookkeeping for inputs and outputs
Calculation of federal, state, and municipal taxes
Issuance of financial statements (Balance Sheet, Income Statement, etc.)
Delivery of ancillary obligations (SPED, ECD, ECF)

items.title: Personnel Department
items.shortDescription: Payroll management, hiring, terminations, vacations, eSocial, and other labor routines.
description: People management involves a series of labor obligations that need to be strictly met to avoid liabilities and lawsuits. eSocial has brought even more complexity to this area.
Our team handles all personnel department routines for your company, from hiring to terminations, ensuring compliance with legislation and security for your company and employees.
checklist: Vacation and 13th salary calculation and control
Issuance of payment slips (FGTS, INSS, IRRF)

items.title: Personal Income Tax
items.shortDescription: Specialized service for personal income tax returns, complex situations, capital gains, and investments.
description: Filing income tax can be simple for some people, but extremely complex for those with investments, multiple income sources, foreign assets, or special situations.
We offer specialized service for returns of any complexity, ensuring you pay only what is due and avoid problems with the Federal Revenue Service.
checklist: Regularization of pending issues with Federal Revenue

items.title: Digital Certification
items.shortDescription: Guidance and intermediation in issuing digital certificates for individuals and legal entities.
description: Digital certificates are essential for signing electronic documents, accessing government systems, and fulfilling tax obligations. Choosing the correct type and proper issuance are fundamental.
We offer all the necessary support for issuing your digital certificate, guiding you on the best type for your needs and expediting the entire process.
checklist: Guidance on certificate types (A1, A3, e-CPF, e-CNPJ)
